Articles.Content: I just got the game and have been watching a lot of youtube videos and notice that everyone has more landing gear (wheels) than I do. I just have the regular old one choice for wheels option. anyone know where I can download more wheels?

Lemme see...

It could be here

If you want spefics:

This is good, for cars mostly.

if you want some rovers, or some axels...

So I downloaded them, unzipped them, went in the folder, then into the parts folder dragged everything in there over to the parts folder in the KSP folder. I then opened up the game and the parts show up but they are blue and I cannot select them. Any idea what happened? I am not super tech savvy and need some help with this...

You might be missing the cart plugin.

You can find it here. Just copy it in the plugin folder, restart your game and you should be good.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7854-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Carts-v1-34-Cruise-Control-Compatibility-and-More?highlight=cart
